column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Not really coming for the paella
column2: but loving the tapas! Do yourself a favor and order the seared cana de cabra
column3: this was out of this world
column4: perfectly balanced flavorful! Plato de la casa and papas bravas are good to start it off. Manchego mushrooms are a MUST
column5: even tho they are not selected as house favorites. Get them
column6: no regrets. Not a sangria lover myself but I heard is really tasty.
